function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of outdoor environment occupancy and density may lead to ineffective crowd management and disease transmission control.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clinical staff using pulse oximeters can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly sanitized between uses.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using consumer-grade wearables to measure students’ anxiety and depression may lead to data privacy and security risks.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of shared wearable devices and smart technology in educational settings.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited validation studies for wearables at the clinical level","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Security breach risk in wearable devices","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data security and patient confidentiality concerns","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges related to the design trade-offs, improved sensors, power, size, computation algorithms, and security","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of multifunctional capabilities in wearables","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited control of environmental conditions and confounding factors in natural history studies.","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited data set of 117 countries may not be representative of global disease propagation patterns","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene during data collection","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of multiple sectors to the impacts of contagious diseases","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in architecture, civil engineering, and urbanism practices due to contagious diseases","category":"Architecture","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on health in the built environment","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Involving a large number of individuals in the decision-making process may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases, especially during in-person meetings or consultations.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of likert rating system involving 25 participants may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases if gathering in person.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid development in the sectors of construction and the built environment may lead to inadequate consideration of contagious disease propagation risk.","category":"Architecture","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate weighting of factors against primary cbe areas may result in misaligned development priorities.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases among construction sector participants","category":"Construction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in off-site construction may lead to a higher risk of contagious diseases transmission due to transportation of materials and workers from various locations.","category":"Construction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of digital techniques and technologies in construction may facilitate the spread of misinformation and fake news related to contagious diseases.","category":"Construction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid shelter construction and emergency constructions may lead to overcrowding and inadequate ventilation, increasing the risk of airborne contagious diseases transmission.","category":"Construction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for lightweight buildings and structural systems","category":"Construction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptive methods leading to less compact working environments and more individual allocated spaces","category":"Construction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of airborne virus transmission due to poor sound-proof protection and insulation in multi-storey buildings","category":"Construction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of high population density on the spread of covid-19","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes to density considerations and urban layouts","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adaptive measures in spatial planning","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Major changes to internal layouts of public buildings and commercial spaces","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical impacts of disease outbreaks on interior design","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent measures across different building typologies","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of attention to community-level safety and prevention strategies","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of attention to green spaces and communal areas","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective building systems and air distribution patterns","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential development changes in construction and built environment sectors","category":"Construction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to population density and compact design in built environments.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insecure storage of sensitive medical data on distributed p2p file storage system.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of openpgp for generating and managing pgp keys for patients’ medical data.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unhygienic conditions in wet markets","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to accommodate increasing covid-19 cases in hospitals","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High similarity between sars-cov-2 and bat coronaviruses","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High mortality rates of known coronaviruses mers-cov, sars-cov","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disrupted circadian sleep-wake rhythm leading to decreased immune defense","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Manifestation of covid-19 as pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhalation of aerosols containing pathogens","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific diagnostic techniques for early detection of sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of serologic tests for covid-19","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific treatments and vaccines for coronavirus infections","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drugs in treatment of sars-cov-2 infection","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"}]}
